author: Adrian Garro
title: Mike Trout's at it again, making a young fan's dreams come true at Spring Training | MLB.com
text:
Mike Trout's at it again, making a young fan's dreams come true at Spring Training Email By Adrian Garro | 
Everybody likes Mike Trout . 
He's an elite player on the field , a pretty amazing one off it and inspires the kind of youthful jubilation in young fans that can only be described visually: 
With Trout's Angels back in action at Spring Training once again, so, too, are plenty of young fans eager to catch a glimpse, baseball or autograph from their heroes (like Trout). 
That's one kid who won't ever forget this moment -- and, we must point out, demonstrates the magic of Spring Training, where this kind of thing happens all the time. This story was not subject to the approval of Major League Baseball or its clubs. more from cut4
